TITLE: Welcome to My App
Name: Name
NameRequired: Name is required. Please enter your name.
EmailRequired: Email is required. Please enter a valid email.
EmailInvalid: The email you entered is invalid.
EmailGeneric: The email is too generic or invalid.

PhoneNumberMaxLength: Phone number should not exceed 8 digits.
PasswordComplexity: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character (e.g., !#$%^&*).

PasswordMinLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long.

PasswordSpecialChar: Password must contain at least one special character.
